snippet: New York City Opera’s Vox Contemporary American Opera Lab included performances featured in a half-dozen works in progress.
abstract: Corinna da Fonseca-Wollheim reviews 13th installment of New York City Opera's Vox Contemporary Opera Lab at Skirball Center for the Performing Arts at New York University.
lead_paragraph: New York City Opera’s Vox Contemporary American Opera Lab included performances featured in a half-dozen works in progress.

headline.seo: Vox Contemporary American Opera Lab at Skirball Center
headline.main: An Opera Lover’s Buffet of What Is in the Works
headline.print_headline: An Opera Lover’s Buffet Of What Is in the Works
